column5: SYN normally its quite obvious if a company is a pump and dump normally penny stocks in which case youd want to short headquarters is in some shady complex the senior staff have ambiguous credentials a barrage of pump news etc in this case Google the headquarters read the sec docs do your due diligence This company seems to be one of those legit ones that if when their trials hit the profits are going to be enormous Closer to earnings report and if any of the staff starts loading its worth the risk to me Good luck folks Btw I set my sell to a ridiculous three digit dollar amount and forgetting about this for awhile Im all about quick turn overs but not so much with this one
